passives.name: Spoils of War
passives.effects: Grants a charge every 20 seconds, up to 4 charges. Melee basic attacks can consume one charge to execute minions below 350- 860 (based on level) (+ 100% AD) health. Melee basic attacks that would trigger Spoils of War gain 150 bonus range and 30% bonus attack speed. Killing a minion by any means with a charge heals you and the nearest allied champion for 15- 90 (based on missing health) health and grants them kill gold. Healing is halved if the owner is ranged. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby.

other.limit: Limited to 1 Jungle or Gold Income item.
